product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Mesh Stuff Sack
long_description: Small in stature but big in strength, the Sea to Summit Ultra-Mesh Stuff Sack lets you organize your backpacking (or traveling) essentials for easy visibility and quick retrieval. Strong 15-denier multifilament nylon mesh construction lets you see what each bag holds. Drawstring with toggle provides secure closure. Circumference of stuff sack opening is constructed of ultra-sil nylon for smooth operation with drawstring. For durability and strength, seams are double stitched and reinforced.
short_description: Small in stature but big in strength, the Sea to Summit Ultra-Mesh Stuff Sack lets you organize your backpacking (or traveling) essentials for easy visibility and quick retrieval.
